item.title: Namespaces
item.description: Once you start to develop a number of Viash components, you may want to group them together for improved maintenance and a separation of concerns. In addition, multiple developers could work on different sets of components in parallel and later bring them together in a larger project. We call a group of components a namespace. Building a namespace You can assign a component to a namespace by defining its namespace attribute in the viash config file:
